attributes.action: MP's to take a 10% pay cut & all the money to go to support M H for our children
attributes.background: I have just watched Panorama on tv and felt that I had to do something to help the young people in the country that are dealing and living with mental health issues. We need to do more to help them, they are the future of this country.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government or Parliament is not responsible for setting MPs' pay. This is set by the Independent Parliamentary Standards Authority. 

You may wish to sign this petition to increase funding for mental health services instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/224239
